text: (ibrahim metaram durata pævasuvada) lut (nabi pamanakma) ohuva visvasa kalaha. (ebævin ibrahim ohuta) “niyata vasayenma ma mage deviyange balaporottuven (mage mema rata athæra dama) yannemi. niyata vasayenma ohu (siyallantama) balasampannayeku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya” yayi pævasuveya
